name: Planning
summary: Plan the incident and do the background research needed to support it, eg. ways/means/ends, goal setting, target population research, creating master narratives.

name: Preparation
summary: Develop the ecosystem needed to support the incident: people, network, channels, content etc.

name: Execution
summary: Run the incident, from initial exposure to wrap-up and/or maintaining presence etc.

name: Evaluation
summary: Evaluate effectiveness of incident, for use in future plans
